title: Compilation error from source
body_html:
Using Ubuntu 17
The C compiler identification is GNU 4.8.5
The CXX compiler identification is GNU 4.8.5

/home/develop_kaa/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(45): error: namespace "std" has no member "to_string"

/home/develop_kaa/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(31): error: namespace "std" has no member "isinf"
          detected during instantiation of "To at::checked_convert<To,From>(From, const char *) [with To=uint8_t, From=double]"
/home/develop_kaa/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/Scalar.h(75): here

/home/develop_kaa/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(34): error: namespace "std" has no member "isnan"
          detected during instantiation of "To at::checked_convert<To,From>(From, const char *) [with To=uint8_t, From=double]"
/home/develop_kaa/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/Scalar.h(75): here

3 errors detected in the compilation of "/tmp/tmpxft_00006849_00000000-6_IndexUtils.cpp1.ii".
CMake Error at ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /home/develop_kaa/pytorch/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/./ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o


src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1113: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o' failed
